price: Así los castigué por ser desagradecidos, y no castigo así sino al desagradecido.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَيۡنَٰهُم بِمَا كَفَرُواْۖ وَهَلۡ نُجَٰزِيٓ إِلَّا ٱلۡكَفُورَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālika jazaynāhum bimā kafarū wahal nujāzī illā al-kafūra
